content.p: Module convenor: Ahmad Kamil Hakimien Nor Aslan Department: Careers Office LinkedIn is a powerful platform for information gathering, job search as well as offering you an opportunity to be noticed early by recruiters even when you are still studying. This module aims to help students develop a professional LinkedIn for the purpose of effective job search. The compulsory workshop runs as part of this module aim to support students in developing an appreciation of the value of having professional LinkedIn profile and the importance of continually improving their profile throughout their careers. Open to Penultimate* and Final Years** students only. Students are required to attend the following compulsory workshops as follow : We would advise interested applicants to check your timetable before registering for this NAA module. (Please take note that the workshop date might be rescheduled if needed) Students are required to complete two LinkedIn assignments to pass this module. *Penultimate – Year 2 and Year 3 (MEng/BPharm) **Final Years – Year 3 and Year 4 (MEng/BPharm) To register to this module, please go to Nottingham Moodle https://moodle.nottingham.ac.uk/course/view.php?id=141207 page on 1 October 2024, Tuesday at 10:00am By registering to accredit this module you are agreeing to the Terms and Conditions. telephone: +6 (03) 8924 8000 fax: +6 (03) 8924 8001
